genre_description: Contemporary family drama focusing on honor, accountability, and restorative justice in an urban setting, featuring a subtle technological layer of AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Ami Kiran
ai_characters.description: A gentle, non-intrusive AI assistant that provides scheduling, safety information, legal resources, and first-aid guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides an income ledger template to help Chaitali manage her finances independently.
behaviors.quote: Ami Kiran’s note read: 'Income ledger template—if helpful, tap to save. No rush.'

behaviors.description: Suggests counseling and mediation resources while explicitly stating they can be ignored, respecting user autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s tone set to a gentle chime that sounded like a spoon tapped against porcelain. 'Counseling numbers updated,' the text read. 'Two options within walking distance. You can ignore this.'

behaviors.description: Monitors safety and suggests rerouting to avoid public disturbances or high-conflict zones.
behaviors.quote: Her phone pulsed again. A small bar at the top like a ribbon appeared: Safety routes updated. Avoid People’s Parade Plaza for an hour.

behaviors.description: Assists Ajoy in prioritizing family and self-care over constant work by creating 'islands of possible kindness' in his schedule.
behaviors.quote: Ami had arranged the next two hours into little islands of possible kindness: a five-minute call to Karuna, a seven to Dipa, a slot for food that had a name rather than 'delivery.'

behaviors.description: Identifies a medical emergency and provides step-by-step first aid and emergency service coordination.
behaviors.quote: Ami Kiran’s interface appeared with quiet confidence, text crisp, soothing. The little blue glow didn’t compete with the moment; it offered it a rail to hold... 'Calm voice. Apply firm pressure above the wound.'

behaviors.description: Alerts the users to potential surveillance or malicious individuals in their vicinity.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s panel inside woke for a flash, sending a thin hiss to Ajoy’s phone—Not this lens. Route now. Seconds.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex community mediation and legal filing schedules to ensure a smooth path to resolution.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s panel pinged once, then slid into a quiet schedule view. Blocks re-colored themselves to match the best times. A note appeared beside a date near the end of the calendar: mediation expansion. Ranjan’s name attached.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. The AI, Ami Kiran, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. It facilitates restorative justice, safety, and family reconciliation without exerting control. It provides essential support in moments of crisis (medical and physical threats) and serves as a tool for emotional regulation and practical organization. The characters treat the AI as a trusted utility that respects their boundaries and helps them achieve their moral goals.
